alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 11:53AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...LIGHT SNOW AFFECTING THE DEVILS LAKE BASIN AND NORTHERN RED RIVER VALLEY... Light snow across the Devils Lake Basin and northern Red River Valley has led to slippery road conditions. Additional snowfall totals up to an inch are expected, ending by 6 pm this evening. Motorists should slow down to a safe speed and plan extra time to reach their destinations. Don`t use cruise control. Be especially careful around stop lights, school bus stops, and intersections. Check road conditions... By Phone: call 511 Website for North Dakota: travel.dot.nd.gov Website for Minnesota: 511mn.org ...SLIPPERY ROADS CONTINUE...
